original_text: We will make an agreement with our God. We will agree to send away these foreign women and their children. As our leader, you have told us we must do this. The people who respect our God's commands say the same thing. Now we want to do what God's law says is right.
korean_text: 곧 내 주의 교훈을 따르며 우리 하나님의 명령을 떨며 준행하는 자의 가르침을 따라 이 모든 아내와 그들의 소생을 다 내보내기로 우리 하나님과 언약을 세우고 율법대로 행할 것이라

sentences.original_text: We will make an agreement with our God
We will agree to send away these foreign women
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이 외국 여인들을 보내는 데 동의하겠습니다

sentences.original_text: As our leader, you have told us
The people who respect our God's commands
what God's law says is right
